issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Appcelerator CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Tooling and the CLI here

fields.description:
Hi,

I am trying to package a sample project (w/o any modifications), together with icons for different resolutions in "platform/android/res/" folder, but the packaging fails with the error below.

I am attaching the archive

Regards, Vladimir

[INFO] :   Packaging application: C:\Program Files (x86)\Android\android-sdk\build-tools\19.0.1\aapt.exe "package" "-f" "-m" "-J" "C:\develop\Titanium_Studio_Workspace\TestIcons\build\android\gen" "-M" "C:\develop\Titanium_Studio_Workspace\TestIcons\build\android\AndroidManifest.xml" "-A" "C:\develop\Titanium_Studio_Workspace\TestIcons\build\android\bin\assets" "-S" "C:\develop\Titanium_Studio_Workspace\TestIcons\build\android\res" "-I" "C:\Program Files (x86)\Android\android-sdk\platforms\android-18\android.jar" "-I" "C:\Users\vladi\AppData\Roaming\Titanium\mobilesdk\win32\3.2.0.GA\android\titanium.jar" "-F" "C:\develop\Titanium_Studio_Workspace\TestIcons\build\android\bin\app.ap_"
[ERROR] :  Failed to package application:
[ERROR] Application Installer abnormal process termination. Process exit value was 1
fields.summary: [android] cannot package project with icons in "platform" folder

comments.body:
i had a typo in the drawable-xdpi folder - had to be drawable-xhdpi

but i do not know how to close the issue
sorry..
It turned out to be a user error. Closing this ticket based on reporter's confirmation.
